name: Daze
storyline: Mark's mother has a memory loss problem after his father’s death. She was missing suddenly and he is trying to find her. He had to go through many unusual events to find her Because He is stuck in a dream since he got into a coma. Yet he doesn’t know about that. Reality is his mother died in a car accident and that accident put Mark into a coma.
summary: The world you’re about to experience Crafted by researching Multiple comatose patients real-life and Dreamworld events. No Matter where you come from or who you are, allow me to be the first to say: Welcome to Daze. A point&click game where unique minimalistic art style creates an unforgettable and atmospheric experience. The game is about a young 12 year’s old boy who lost his mother, now he is on his way to find her.
